## CircularDepError.getDetailedMessage() method

Generates a detailed error message for circular dependency detection. Includes the original error message, dependency chain, and circular path.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getDetailedMessage(): string;
```
**Returns:**

string

{<!-- -->string<!-- -->} Formatted error message with dependency details.
